00015 #define CLEAR_MANIFOLD 1
00016 
00017 #include "btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm.h"
00018 #include "BulletCollision/CollisionDispatch/btCollisionDispatcher.h"
00019 #include "BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btSphereShape.h"
00020 #include "BulletCollision/CollisionDispatch/btCollisionObject.h"
00021 #include "BulletCollision/CollisionDispatch/btCollisionObjectWrapper.h"

00023 btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm::btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm(btPersistentManifold* mf,const btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* col0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* col1Wrap)
00024 : btActivatingCollisionAlgorithm(ci,col0Wrap,col1Wrap),
00025 m_ownManifold(false),
00026 m_manifoldPtr(mf)
00027 {
00028         if (!m_manifoldPtr)
00029         {
00030                 m_manifoldPtr = m_dispatcher->getNewManifold(col0Wrap->getCollisionObject(),col1Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00031                 m_ownManifold = true;
00032         }
00033 }
00034 
00035 btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm::~btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm()
00036 {
00037         if (m_ownManifold)
00038         {
00039                 if (m_manifoldPtr)
00040                         m_dispatcher->releaseManifold(m_manifoldPtr);
00041         }
00042 }
00043 
00044 void btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm::processCollision (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* col0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* col1Wrap,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00045 {
00046         (void)dispatchInfo;
00047 
00048         if (!m_manifoldPtr)
00049                 return;
00050 
00051         resultOut->setPersistentManifold(m_manifoldPtr);
00052 
00053         btSphereShape* sphere0 = (btSphereShape*)col0Wrap->getCollisionShape();
00054         btSphereShape* sphere1 = (btSphereShape*)col1Wrap->getCollisionShape();
00055 
00056         btVector3 diff = col0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getOrigin()-  col1Wrap->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00057         btScalar len = diff.length();
00058         btScalar radius0 = sphere0->getRadius();
00059         btScalar radius1 = sphere1->getRadius();
00060 
00061 #ifdef CLEAR_MANIFOLD
00062         m_manifoldPtr->clearManifold(); //don't do this, it disables warmstarting
00063 #endif
00064 
00066         if ( len > (radius0+radius1+resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold))
00067         {
00068 #ifndef CLEAR_MANIFOLD
00069                 resultOut->refreshContactPoints();
00070 #endif //CLEAR_MANIFOLD
00071                 return;
00072         }
00074         btScalar dist = len - (radius0+radius1);
00075 
00076         btVector3 normalOnSurfaceB(1,0,0);
00077         if (len > SIMD_EPSILON)
00078         {
00079                 normalOnSurfaceB = diff / len;
00080         }
00081 
00085         btVector3 pos1 = col1Wrap->getWorldTransform().getOrigin() + radius1* normalOnSurfaceB;
00086 
00088         
00089         
00090         resultOut->addContactPoint(normalOnSurfaceB,pos1,dist);
00091 
00092 #ifndef CLEAR_MANIFOLD
00093         resultOut->refreshContactPoints();
00094 #endif //CLEAR_MANIFOLD
00095 
00096 }
00097 
00098 btScalar btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm::calculateTimeOfImpact(btCollisionObject* col0,btCollisionObject* col1,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00099 {
00100         (void)col0;
00101         (void)col1;
00102         (void)dispatchInfo;
00103         (void)resultOut;
00104 
00105         //not yet
00106         return btScalar(1.);
00107 }
